author: Ashtan Mistal
title: Autograders for practice exams
question:
For the first time, we are beginning to deploy autograders for the practice exams.
Unfortunately it is somewhat time consuming, because the underlying autograder functionality has been evolving rapidly, so we have to bring each grader up to date before we can deploy it.  (Remember, software is always changing.)  Following is the current status and a couple of important caveats.
These autograders are intended to help you assess you own solution, but
there might be mistakes in them, if you see a mistake please report it.
MORE IMPORTANTLY do not assume that the way one of these graders assesses a problem or assigns weights to a problem is exactly what will happen on the midterm.  These graders are not establishing any kind of precedent.
Right now, the 2021w1-mt1 and 2020w2-mt1 graders are working.
You can access the practice exams at: https://cs110.students.cs.ubc.ca/exams/
